instruction: Describe the opportunities provided by virtual reality for businesses.
output: Virtual reality provides businesses with the opportunity to create more immersive and engaging experiences for customers. It can be used to provide virtual tours of properties, workshops and stores, allowing customers to get a realistic feel for the product or service before purchasing it. Additionally, VR can also be used to create unique and interactive events, allowing businesses to reach out to customers in a more impactful way. Lastly, VR can also be used to explore and design new products, saving time and money by testing them in a virtual environment before they are released to the public.
